results.name: Square array read by antidiagonals arising in the enumeration of corners.
link: G. Kreweras, Sur les extensions linéaires d'une famille particulière d'ordres partiels, Discrete Math., 27 (1979), 279-295.
G. Kreweras, Sur les extensions linéaires d'une famille particulière d'ordres partiels, Discrete Math., 27 (1979), 279-295. (Annotated scanned copy)
formula: Kreweras gives an explicit formula for the general term (see bottom display on page 291).
mathematica: Table[Table[a[x-y, y], {y, 0, x}] // Reverse, {x, 0, 9}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 11 2017 *)
xref: The first row and column of the array are the Catalan numbers A000108.
The second row and column are A214824.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 22 2015
